definitions.text: provide physical relief, as from pain
examples: This pill will relieve your headaches

definitions.text: free someone temporarily from his or her obligations
grant relief or an exemption from a rule or requirement to
examples: She exempted me from the exam

definitions.text: lessen the intensity of or calm
save from ruin, destruction, or harm
free from a burden, evil, or distress

examples: Please excuse me from this class

definitions.text: alleviate or remove (pressure or stress) or make less oppressive
examples: relieve the pressure and the stress
lighten the burden of caring for her elderly parents
